nodes.text: Joal Torviss was a female merchant who served the Sith Empire during the Great Galactic War against the Galactic Republic. Working on board the space station known as the Vaiken Spacedock within the Imperial fleet, she provided other Imperials with equipment from her workplace in the supplies section of the station. While working she wore bronze and red armor.

Joal Torviss was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game she serves as an Imperial ultimate gear vendor within the Imperial fleet. She was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
